popt4jlib.PS
Class RandomChromosomeSelector

java.lang.Object
  popt4jlib.PS.RandomChromosomeSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
popt4jlib.PS.ChromosomeSelectorIntf
public class RandomChromosomeSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements popt4jlib.PS.ChromosomeSelectorIntf

class implements a random selection procedure: a random individual is selected from the island sub-population, and returned as "guiding" solution.

Title: popt4jlib
